This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the [[Buzzy Bees]] update ({{BE}} 1.14.x releases), which assumes at least some familiarity with ''Bedrock Edition'' 1.13.x releases.

== Mobs ==
=== New ===
{| {{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}} 
|-
| [[Bee]]
| [[File:Bee BE.gif|128px|center]]
| Spawn near [[bee nest]]s.
| {{xp|1|3}} (when killed by a [[player]] or tamed [[wolf]])
|
* Inflict poison if provoked
* Attack in a swarm
|}

== Blocks ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Blocks}} 
|-
| [[Beehive]]
| [[File:Beehive JE1 BE1.png|84px|center]]
|
{{Crafting|A1=Any Planks|B1=Any Planks|C1=Any Planks|A2=Honeycomb|B2=Honeycomb|C2=Honeycomb|A3=Any Planks|B3=Any Planks|C3=Any Planks|Output=Beehive}}
| Can be mined with any tool or by hand, but [[axe]]s are fastest.
|
* Houses bees.
* If the player breaks or havests honey from it, its bees become hostile to the player.
** Bees inside the hive do not turn hostile if it is harvested with Silk Touch, but bees outside the hive do.
** Bees do not turn hostile if there is a [[campfire]] underneath the hive when honeycombs or honey bottles are harvested.
|-
| [[Bee nest]]
| [[File:Bee Nest JE1 BE1.png|84px|center]]
| Spawn naturally in [[flower forest]]s, [[plains]], and [[sunflower plains]] biomes.
| Can be mined with any tool enchanted with Silk Touch.
| Functions the same as beehives.
|-
| [[Honey block]]
| [[File:Honey Block JE1 BE2.png|84px|center]]
|
{{Crafting|A2=Honey Bottle|B2=Honey Bottle|A3=Honey Bottle|B3=Honey Bottle|Output=Honey Block}}
| Can be broken instantly, regardless of held items.
|
* Works the same way as [[slime block]]s.
** Does not stick to slime blocks.
* Carries mobs along that are standing on it while being moved, in contrast to slime blocks.
* Mobs usually avoid walking on them.
* Entities can slide down its sides, similar to a ladder.
* Falling on it absorbs 80% of fall damage.
|-
| [[Honeycomb block]]
| [[File:Honeycomb Block JE1 BE1.png|84px|center]]
|
{{Crafting|A2=Honeycomb|B2=Honeycomb|A3=Honeycomb|B3=Honeycomb|Output=Honeycomb Block}}
| Can be broken with any tool.
| Decorative block.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Blocks}}
|-
| [[Dispenser]]s
| [[File:Dispenser.png|84px|center]]
|
* Can now harvest honeycombs when dispensing shears on bee nests and beehives filled with honey.
** The honeycomb items are dropped on the ground.
* Can now collect water bottles and honey bottles when dispensing glass bottles on water and beehives.
|-
| [[Slime block]]
| {{animate|Slime Block BE2.png;Slime Block.png|84px}}
| Changed texture to match Java Edition's
|}

== Items ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Items}}
|-
| [[Honey bottle]]
| [[File:Honey Bottle JE1 BE2.png|84px]]
| Obtained by using a bottle on beehives/nests with a {{cd|honey_level}} of 5.
|
* Restores {{Hunger|6}}.
* Used to craft honey blocks.
* Can be consumed regardless of the player's hunger.
|-
| [[Honeycomb]]
| [[File:Honeycomb JE2 BE2.png|84px]]
| Obtained by using shears on beehives/nests with a {{cd|honey_level}} of 5.
| Used to craft beehives and honeycomb blocks.
|-
| Bee's [[spawn egg]]
| [[File:Bee Spawn Egg JE2 BE1.png|84px]]
| Can be obtained only via creative inventory. 
|
* Used to spawn [[bee]]s.
* Has the same function as other [[spawn egg]]s.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Items}}
|-
| [[Lead]]
| [[File:Lead.png|84px]]
| Can now be used on [[dolphin]]s, [[ocelot]]s, [[parrot]]s, and [[polar bear]]s.
|-
| [[Spawn egg]]s
|
| Are now sorted alphabetically in the Creative inventory.
|}

== Gameplay ==
=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Gameplay}}
|-
| [[Swimming]]
| The player can no longer start swimming in 1-block deep water.
|}
